titles.title: Supporting Rural Veterans Access to Healthcare Services Act
Supporting Rural Veterans Access to Healthcare Services Act
A bill to extend and modify the transportation grant program of the Department of Veterans Affairs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Hearings held.
Committee on Veterans' Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

committee.name: Senate Veterans' Affairs
committee.activity: Markup By, Hearings By (Full Committee), Referred To
